dialogue.text: PHIL!!! WHY AREN'T YOU WORKING!!! YOU HAVE TO FINISH A REPORT IN 3 HOURS!!
YOU'RE FIRED!!! YOU'VE PISSED ME OFF WITH YOUR SLACKING!!!
AND THAT KID BESIDE YOU, IS THAT THE REASON I HEARD THOSE HORRIBLE SOUNDS?
uhmmmmmm i just wanted to rap battle :3
SO THAT'S WHY YOU WERE SLACKING?! IM GONNA KILL THE BOTH OF YOU NOW!!
YOU ARE ALL DISMISSED... IN HELL!!!!
smh this demon really understimating the laws of friday night funkin bro..
guess theres no choice but to fight him now
